title: How to sing karaoke without sounding bad - Quora

response.answer_text: Healthy and effective vocal technique is the same whether you’re singing karaoke or with a live professional orchestra in front of 5,000 people. In my experience, many vocal issues typically come down to not having enough breath and/or resonance. Here’s a short video about resonance:  Here’s another video which describes healthy and effective vocal technique, in a nutshell:
